title: PneumaticPlus PPP4-N04BG Compressed Air Filter Regulator Piggyback Combo 1/2" NPT, 5 Micron, Poly Bowl, Manual Drain, Bracket, Embedded Gauge
features: Max. Supply Pressure: 250 PSI, Operating Pressure Range: 0-140 PSI 166 SCFM @ 90PSI
Particualte Filter: 5 Micron Element, High Strength, recleanable element, Port Size:1/2" NPT
Manual Drain & Poly Bowl with Guard, Embedded Gauge (0-140 PSI)
Use Metal bowl in pressure exceeding 150PSI or when solvents harmful to polycarbonate is present
ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURER - Made In Korea
description: PPP Series piggyback air filter regulator offers space saving complete airline solution for most effective air filtration and pressure control to keep your air tools working properly. PPL Modular Series Lubricator can connect to PPP Modular Series Air Filters/Regulator using our brackets to form a fully functional FRL unit. PPF Series Filters and PPL Series Lubricators are available for purchase along with other Pneumatic Plus Air Preparation Units.
